term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - multiple-pass cell in spectrochemical analysis
term.title: multiple-pass cell

item.text: Permits multiple passage of radiation to increase the absorption pathlength. It is constructed in such a way that mirrors either form part of the cell or are mounted in the sample cell holder.

sources.item: PAC, 1988, 60, 1449. 'Nomenclature, symbols, units and their usage in spectrochemical analysis - VII. Molecular absorption spectroscopy, ultraviolet and visible (UV/VIS) (Recommendations 1988)' on page 1454 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198860091449)
